abilities.name: Amphibious.
abilities.description: The kuo-toa can breathe air and water.

abilities.name: Otherwordly Perception.
abilities.description: The kuo-toa can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of it that is invisible or on the Ethereal Plane. It can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

abilities.name: Slippery.
abilities.description: The kuo-toa has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
abilities.description: While in sunlight, the kuo-toa has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The kuo-toa is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The kuo-toa has the following cleric spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): guidance, sacred flame, thaumaturgy
* 1st level (4 slots): detect magic, sanctuary, shield of faith
* 2nd level (3 slots): hold person, spiritual weapon
* 3rd level (3 slots): spirit guardians, tongues
* 4th level (3 slots): control water, divination
* 5th level (2 slots): mass cure wounds, scrying
